frontmatter.title: Getting Started with X-Ray Receiver in AWS Distro for OpenTelemetry Collector
frontmatter.description: AWS X-Ray is a service that collects data about requests that your application serves, and provides tools you can use to view, filter, and gain insights into that data to identify issues and opportunities for optimization. For any traced request to your application, you can see detailed information not only about the request and response, but also about calls that your application makes to downstream AWS resources, microservices, databases and HTTP web APIs.

headings.value: Set X-Ray Reciever Configurations Related to the Local TCP Proxy Server
